pluggable.name: Jambo
pluggable.author: Drunken Monkey Labs
pluggable.description: Adds a contact form to any page or post.

help.value:
Add a contact form by inserting [contact_form/] into an entry or page. The configuration settings can be overridden with attributes:

  • send_to - where to send the email
  • subject - the subject of the email; %s will be replaced with a subject which the user will be asked to provide
  • success_message - the message to show when the email is sent

For example [contact_form send_to="quotes@mastermade.us" subject="Quote Request"/] would send an email to quotes@mastermade.us with the subject Quote Request.
